patthana15.78:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.78:2.1_0: Saraṇaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.78:3.1_0: Araṇaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
